attributes.action: Increase funding for Metal detectors to locate ingested Coins in the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
The link to the field testing of Metal detectors of 17 year old and under! 

https://emj.bmj.com/content/22/12/839?fbclid=IwAR2o5WDhV8f_r0mQSsWCAwpgj1rZgls66cSEoskOHwbCwes2pUr7696r7ig

The Radiological Society Of North America's clinical error findings!

https://pubs.rsna.org/doi/full/10.1148/rg.2015150023?fbclid=IwAR0SGq5aITs9dUqqkn362wFwdQ4_oQ6aGkl4-H0D707tu9jE7dAPRbIrq3U”
attributes.background: Till recently the way to check for ingest coins was X-Ray, not only do these introduce a further degree of human error. They also expose people to Harmful Ionising Radiation. Metal Detectors use non Ionising Radiation (no harmful effects) & are reported to be 99.8 percent accurate in detection!
